response.original_title: Rob Sims Presents Fit Models Totally Exposed: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker Vol.3
response.overview: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker was filmed in one of the world's most notorious nest of unashamed sexual immorality: The Hedonist II nudist resort in Negril, Jamaica. This footage is completely uninhibited, unscripted and unbelievable! The girls really let it loose on this DVD! You've never seen these girls in action like you'll see here. These sexy models were given the freedom to do whatever they wanted, and their actions went beyond anything we ever imagined. They were left wearing next to nothing... and we caught it all on tape. Featured models: Sharra Kris, Sandy Jones, Tracy Tripiciano and Tina Antero!
response.title: Rob Sims Presents Fit Models Totally Exposed: The Girls of National Lampoon's Strip Poker Vol.3
